Title: Long-term super-resolution imaging of amyloid structures using transient binding of Thioflavin T
Abstract: © 2019 The Author(s).Amyloids are implicated in Alzheimer's disease but cannot be well resolved by standard light microscopy. We developed a tool to directly image native amyloid structures and dynamics at nanometer resolution over minutes to days.
